                                   18620                         Build new fragment queue entry.  
                                   18621

 00285C 58E0 B27E/0DEE       02A8C 18623                       ACALL GETCORE             Get storage
 002862 5015 0000            00000 18627                       ST    R1,FRAGNEXT-FRAG(R5)  Chain new to previous entry
 002866 5041 0000            00000 18628                       ST    R4,FRAGNEXT-FRAG(R1)  Chain next entry to new
 00286A 1841                       18629                       LR    R4,R1               New entry base
 00286C 5020 4008            00008 18630                       ST    R2,FRAGOFF          Fragment offset

                                   18662

 00289A 5840 4000            00000 18671  1                      L     R4,FRAGNEXT         Get next entry address

 00289E D503 401C 700C_0001C 0000C        1                            (FRAGID,EQ,IPID)),EXIT     and IP id match, exit loop
 0028B2 47F0 B08A            02898 18710                       END
                                   18715                       
                                   18716                         Check if we now have the complete packet.  
                                   18717                       
 0028B6 1B66                       18718                       CLEAR R6                  Init offset/length
 0028B8                            18722                       LOOP  BEGIN               Step through queue
                                   18728  1         C            IF    ((FRAGSRC,NE,IPSRC),OR,   If past current packet
                                          1         C                  (FRAGID,NE,IPID),OR,      or don't have final
                                          1         C                  (R6,NE,FRAGOFF),OR,        fragment yet,
 0028B8 D503 401C 700C_0001C 0000C        1                            (FRAGMORE,AND,(FRAGNEXT,Z))),BEGIN
 0028E6 41F0 0004            00004 18804  2                        LA    R15,4               Set RC=4
 0028EA 47F0 B162            02970 18805  2                        EXIT  RCVFRAG             Return
 0028EE                            18808  1                      END

 0028F2 9120 4016/47E0_00016       18813  1                      IF    ~FRAGMORE,EXIT      Exit if last fragment
 0028FA 5840 4000            00000 18831  1                      L     R4,FRAGNEXT         Chain to next fragment
 0028FE 47F0 B0AA            028B8 18832                       END

                                   18838                         We have a complete packet.  Allocate buffer and move in

0                                  18981              
                                   18982                                                                                   
                                   18983                 IPFTIMER -- IP packet fragment timer routine.  Entered by         
                                   18984                             timer routine to age fragment queue entries           
                                   18985                             Delete queue entries if their time-to-live has        
                                   18986                             now expired.                                          
                                   18987

 0029A8 BF2F 2000            00000 19051  1                      L4    R2,FRAGNEXT         Chain to next entry

                                   23031                 TCPREJCT -- reject passive TCP connection open

000399C 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 23033              TCPREJCT PROC
 USING  *,R11
                                   23075            C          IF    (TCBFUID,OR,        If received user id,
                                                    C                ((TCBSTATE,NE,ESTABLSH),AND,  or inappropriate state
                                                    C                (TCBSTATE,NE,CLOSWAIT),AND,
 0039C0 9140 8231/4710_00231                                         (TCBSTATE,NE,CLOSED))),BEGIN

0                                  23196              
                                   23197                                                                                   
                                   23198                 TCPACCPT -- complete passive connection open                      
                                   23199                                                                                   
                                   23200                   Called when TCP_ACCEPT message received from path.  This        
                                   23201                    message provides the user connection id for a connection       
                                   23202                    created from a passive open (server port listen).              
                                   23203                                                                                   
                                   23204                   On entry:                                                       
                                   23205                     R0,R1 - parm list                                             
                                   23206                                                                                   
                                   23207                   On exit:                                                        
                                   23208                     R15 - return code (0=OK, 4=bad id  8=invalid request)         
                                   23209                                                                                   
                                                      
0003A04 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 23210              TCPACCPT PROC
 USING  *,R11
 003A28 5820 1000            00000 23252                       L     R2,@R1              Get user connection id
                                   23253            C          IF    (((TCBSTATE,NE,ESTABLSH),AND,
                                                    C                (TCBSTATE,NE,CLOSWAIT),AND,
                                                    C                (TCBSTATE,NE,CLOSED)),
                                                    C                OR,
 003A2C 9504 8230/4780_00230                                         (TCBFUID,AND,(R2,NE,TCBUID))),BEGIN
 003A54 41F0 B460            03E88 23333  1                      LA    R15,=CL16'SEQUENCE ERROR'
 003A58 47F0 B066            03A8E 23334  1                      EXIT  TCPACCPT
 003A5C                            23337                       END
 003A5C 5020 800C            0000C 23341                       ST    R2,TCBUID           Set userid in TCB
 003A60 9640 8231      00231       23342                       SET   TCBFUID             Show userid valid
                                   23348                       
                                   23349                         If there are any path messages queued for the connection,  
                                   23350                           we can send them now after filling in the userid.        
                                   23351                       
 003A64 5820 80B4            000B4 23352                       L     R2,TCBPATHQ         Path message queue head
 003A68 1222/4780 B05E             23353                       WHILE (R2,NZ),BEGIN
 USING  TCBQHDR,R2                 23369  1                      WITH  (TCBQHDR,R2)
 003A6E D503 B498 200C_03EC0 0000C 23382  1                      IF    (TCBQDATA,EQ,'TCP_'),BEGIN   If TCP message,
 003A78 D203 201C 800C 0001C 0000C 23399  2                        MVC   TCBQDATA+16(4),TCBUID        Fill in user connect id
 003A7E                            23400  1                      END
 003A7E 5820 2000            00000 23404  1                      L     R2,TCBQNEXT         Chain to next entry
 003A82 47F0 B040            03A68 23405                       END
 DROP   TCBQHDR,R2
 003A86 58E0 B49C/0DEE       03EC4 23415                       ACALL SNDPATHQ            Go send any queued messages
                                   23419
 003A8C 1BFF                       23420                       CLEAR R15                 Return code
 003A8E 18D9/980C D004_            23424                       PEND

                                   23446

 USING  *,R11
                                   23499                       
                                   23500                         Check connection state.  
                                   23501                       
 003AC0 1200/4780 B00E_            23502                       IF    ((R0,Z),OR,(TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED)),BEGIN
 003ACE 1BFF                       23533  1                      CLEAR R15
 003AD0 47F0 B12A            03BEA 23537  1                      EXIT  TCPWRITE
 003AD4                            23540                       END

                                   23545            C          IF    ((TCBSTATE,NE,ESTABLSH),AND,   Check TCB state
 003AD4 9504 8230/4780_00230                                         (TCBSTATE,NE,CLOSWAIT)),BEGIN
 003AE4 41F0 B3C8            03E88 23580  1                      LA    R15,=CL16'SEQUENCE ERROR'
 003AE8 47F0 B12A            03BEA 23581  1                      EXIT  TCPWRITE            Return
 003AEC                            23584                       END
                                   23588                       
                                   23589                         Check for too much data in send queue  
                                   23590                       
 003AEC 1821                       23591                       LR    R2,R1               Copy data address
 003AEE 1830                       23592                       LR    R3,R0               Copy data length
 003AF0 5800 8058            00058 23593                       L     R0,TCBSNDFN         Compute send
 003AF4 5F00 8050            00050 23594                       SL    R0,TCBSNDUN           queue size
 003AF8 5900 B408/47D0_      03EC8 23595                       IF    (R0,GT,MAXSENDQ),BEGIN  If over limit,
 003B00 4100 0001/5E00_      00001 23612  1                      INCR  R0,NITSNDQ#         Incr counter
 003B0C 58E0 B3F8/0DEE       03EB8 23618  1                      ACALL SENDRST             Send RST to remote host
 003B12 4110 B40C/4100_      03ECC 23622  1                      SETMSG 'ERROR: DATA OVERFLOW'     Abort message text
 003B1A 58E0 B420/0DEE       03EE0 23626  1                      ACALL ABORTTCB            Abort connection
 003B20 41F0 B3D8            03E98 23630  1                      LA    R15,=CL16'DATA OVERFLOW'  Error return
 003B24 47F0 B12A            03BEA 23631  1                      EXIT  TCPWRITE            Exit
 003B28                            23634                       END
                                   23638                       
                                   23639                         Add new entry to end of send queue.  
                                   23640                       
 003B28 4140 80B0            000B0 23641                       LA    R4,TCBSENDQ-(TCBQNEXT-TCBQHDR)  Find end of queue
 USING  TCBQHDR,R4                 23642                       WITH  (TCBQHDR,R4)
 003B2C D603 4000 4000_00000 00000 23655                       WHILE (TCBQNEXT,NZ),'L R4,TCBQNEXT'
 003B3E 4103 000C            0000C 23680                       LA    R0,L'TCBQHDR(R3)    Get entry length
 003B42 58E0 B424/0DEE       03EE4 23681                       ACALL GETBUF              Get memory for queue entry
 003B48 5010 4000            00000 23685                       ST    R1,TCBQNEXT         Chain new entry to last
 003B4C 1841                       23686                       LR    R4,R1               Set new entry base

 000000                            24944  1           RTCPHDR    DS    CL(L'TCPHDR)        Copy of TCP header
 000014                            24945  1           RTCPPLEN   DS    A                   Packet length

 000061                00061 00061 24964                       END
-003F34 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 24974              RCVTCP   PROC  RTCPWORK
 USING  *,R11
 USING  RTCPWORK-(4+52),R9
 003F58 D760 9038 9038 00000 00000 25027                       CLEAR RTCPWORK
                                   25034                       
                                   25035                         Initial packet processing.  Routine will branch back to     
                                   25036                           here to process packets taken off of the out-of-sequence  
                                   25037                           queue.                                                    
                                   25038                       
 003F5E                            25039              RTCPNEXT LABEL
 003F5E 9001 904C            00014 25041                       STM   R0,R1,RTCPPLEN      Save packet length and address
 003F62 1851                       25042                       LR    R5,R1               IP header address

 003F64 4320 5000            00000 25056                       IC    R2,IPIHL            IP header length
 003F68 5420 BAA0            049F8 25057                       N     R2,=A(15)           Isolate length
 003F6C 8920 0002            00002 25058                       SLL   R2,2                Get length in bytes
 003F70 1A12                       25059                       AR    R1,R2               Get TCP packet start address
 003F72 1B02                       25060                       SR    R0,R2               Get TCP packet length
 003F74 9001 905C            00024 25061                       STM   R0,R1,RTCPTCPL      Save length and address
 003F78 1861                       25062                       LR    R6,R1               TCP header address
 USING  TCPHDR,R6                  25063                       WITH  (TCPHDR,R6)         ### TCPHDR

                                   26427                         Abort connection if a TCP_CLOSE message was received from

                                   26512  1                      
                                   26513  1                        Check the ACK bit.  If the packet contains an unacceptable  
                                   26514  1                          ACK then send a RESET and drop the packet.                
                                   26515  1                      
 0043A8 9110 600D/47E0_0000D       26516  1                      IF    TCPFLACK,BEGIN            If ACK set,
                                   26531  2         C              IF    ((TCPACK,LE,TCBISS),OR,   If ACK le ISS  or gt SND.NXT
 0043B0 D503 6008 8034_00008 00034        2                              (TCPACK,GT,TCBSNDNX)),RTCPRST  Send RST and exit
 0043C4                            26569  1                      END
                                   26573  1                
                                   26574  1                  If the RST bit is set,                                   
                                   26575  1                    If there is no ACK, drop the packet and return.        
                                   26576  1                    If there is an ACK, send an abort message to the path  
                                   26577  1                     and delete the TCB.                                   
                                   26578  1

 0043CC 9110 600D/47E0_0000D       26594  2                        IF    ~TCPFLACK,RTCPEXIT  Exit if no ACK

 0043E2 47F0 BA4A            049A2 26620  2                        B     RTCPEXIT            Exit
 0043E6                            26621  1                      END
                                   26625  1                
                                   26626  1                  Process the SYN bit.                                              
                                   26627  1                                                                                    
                                   26628  1                    If SYN is not set, exit.                                        
                                   26629  1                                                                                    
                                   26630  1                    Set IRS and RCV.NXT from the packet sequence number.            
                                   26631  1                                                                                    
                                   26632  1                    Set the state to SYN-RECEIVED.  Final processing of the packet  
                                   26633  1                      and any data in it will be done in the SYN-RECEIVED state

                                   26708                         Add TCB to IP hash queue

 00445A 5080 1000            00000 26746  1                      ST    TCBR,@R1              head of queue
 00445E                            26747                       END
                                   26751                       
                                   26752                         Check the sequence number                             
                                   26753                                                                               
                                   26754                         If simple retransmit (RCV.NXT equals end-sequence),   
                                   26755                         force ACK write if packet contains data but continue  
                                   26756                         processing since packet may contain updated ACK       
                                   26757                         field.                                                
                                   26758                                                                               
                                   26759                         If the packet is completely outside the receive       
                                   26760                         window, drop the packet, sending an ACK if RST not    
                                   26761                         set in packet.                                        
                                   26762                       
 00445E 5800 8048            00048 26763                       L     R0,TCBRCVNX         Start of receive window
 004462 5F00 9064            0002C 26764                       SL    R0,RTCPENDS         RCV.NXT - end-sequence

 00448A                            26824                       END

0                                  26931                       
                                   26932                         Check the SYN bit                                   
                                   26933                                                                             
                                   26934                         Since we haven't trimmed the packet yet, a packet   
                                   26935                         with SYN set may be valid, but we must have TCPSEQ  
                                   26936                         equal to IRS.  If we have an invalid SYN, send a    
                                   26937                         reset and abort the connection.                     
                                   26938                       
 0044C6 9102 600D/47E0_0000D       26939                       IF    (TCPFLSYN,AND,(TCPSEQ,NE,TCBIRS)),BEGIN
 0044D8 58E0 BB08/0DEE       04A60 26971  1                      ACALL SENDRST             Send RST packet
 0044DE 4110 BB60/4100_      04AB8 26975  1                      SETMSG 'HOST ERROR'        Set abort code
 0044E6 58E0 BB00/0DEE       04A58 26979  1                      ACALL ABORTTCB            Start abort processing
 0044EC 47F0 BA4A            049A2 26983  1                      B     RTCPEXIT            Exit
 0044F0                            26984                       END
                                   26988                       
                                   26989                         Process the ACK field                                   
                                   26990                                                                                 
                                   26991                          If no ACK, drop the packet                             
                                   26992                                                                                 
                                   26993                          If state is SYN-RECEIVED,                              
                                   26994                           If valid ACK (which will ACK our SYN), set state to   
                                   26995                            ESTABLISHED and send TCP_CONNECT message over path.  
                                   26996                           If invalid ACK, send RST and drop packet.             
                                   26997

0                                  28868              
                                   28869                                                                                   
                                   28870                 SENDTCP -- Send TCP packet.                                       
                                   28871                                                                                   
                                   28872                  Updates send queue and receive window.  Initiates any needed     
                                   28873                    packet write.                                                  
                                   28874                                                                                   
                                   28875                  Called in the following situations:                              
                                   28876                    -  After a received packet has been processed                  
                                   28877                    -  After a transmit timeout                                    
                                   28878                    -  After receiving data or control from user path              
                                   28879                    -  After full path q cleared, to update receive window         
                                   28880                    -  After keepalive time interval has expired                   
                                   28881                                                                                   
                                   28882                  Register use in routine:                                         
                                   28883                      R7  - TCB pointer (TCBR)                                     
                                   28884                      R6  - New TCP header pointer                                 
                                   28885                      R5  - Send window                                            
                                   28886                      R4  - Output buffer pointer                                  
                                   28887                                                                                   
                                                      
0000000                00000 005C8 28888              STCPWORK RECORD BEGIN
 000000                            28896  1           STCPHDR    DS    CL(L'TCPHDR)        TCP header work area
 000014                            28897  1           STCPDATA   DS    CL(MAXTCPLN)        TCP data work area
 0005C8                005C8 005C8 28898                       END
                                   28907
 004B52 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 28908              SENDTCP  PROC  STCPWORK
 USING  *,R11
 USING  STCPWORK-(4+52),R9
 004B76 9500 8230/4780_00230       28961                       IF    (TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED),EXIT  Return if closed
                                   28982                       
                                   28983                         If we are retransmitting, exit now without sending any  
                                   28984                         packet if this is not a timeout call and no data has    
                                   28985                         been acked.                                             
                                   28986                       
                                   28987            C          IF    (TCBFRXMT,AND,
                                                    C                ~TCBFTMO,AND,
 004B7E 9104 8231/47E0_00231                                         (TCBRXSEQ,EQ,TCBSNDUN)),SENDTCPX
                                   29034                       
                                   29035                         Update retransmit timeout information  
                                   29036                       
                                   29037            C          IF    ((TCBXSEQ,NZ),AND,  If have timed xmit sequence,
 004B98 D603 808C 808C_0008C 0008C                                   (TCBXSEQ,LT,TCBSNDUN)),BEGIN  and sequence acked
 004BAC D703 808C 808C 0008C 0008C 29070  1                      CLEAR TCBXSEQ             Reset timed sequence field
 004BB2 D703 80A8 80A8 000A8 000A8 29077  1                      CLEAR TCBTIMER            Reset timer
 004BB8 9104 8231/4710_00231       29084  1                      IF    ~TCBFRXMT,BEGIN     If not retransmitting,
 004BC0 58E0 B592/0DEE       05108 29099  2                        ACALL GETSRTT             Update SRTT
 004BC6                            29103  1                      END

0                                  29768                       
                                   29769                         Compute available send window.  Avoid sending tinygrams   
                                   29770                         by setting the window to 0 if the remaining window count  
                                   29771                         is less than the send MSS size and there is unacked send  
                                   29772                         data outstanding.                                         
                                   29773

 004D7A 5850 8070            00070 29803  1                      L     R5,TCBSMSS          Use send MSS value
 004D7E                            29804                       END
 004D7E 5950 8074/47D0_      00074 29808                       CEIL  R5,TCBCWIND         Truncate to congestion window
 004D8A 5800 6004            00004 29814                       L     R0,TCPSEQ           Start sequence
 004D8E 5F00 8050            00050 29815                       SL    R0,TCBSNDUN         Get unacked sequence count
 004D92 1B50                       29816                       SR    R5,R0               Subtract unacked from window
 004D94 47B0 B224/1B55       04D9A 29817                       IF    M,'CLEAR R5'        Validity check
 004D9A 5800 8058            00058 29837                       L     R0,TCBSNDFN         Compute queued
 004D9E 5F00 8054            00054 29838                       SL    R0,TCBSNDNX           data count

                                   30039                         Get data length and packet end sequence.  
                                   30040                       
 004E20 4100 904C            00014 30041                       LA    R0,STCPDATA         Start of data buffer
 004E24 1B40                       30042                       SR    R4,R0               Get data byte count
 004E26 5820 6004            00004 30043                       L     R2,TCPSEQ           Start sequence
 004E2A 1E24                       30044                       ALR   R2,R4               Get end sequence
                                   30045                       
                                   30046                         If initial sequence not acked yet, send SYN packet.  There   
                                   30047                         won't be any other send data in this case.  This handles     
                                   30048                         the normal startup sequence plus forces retransmit of our    
                                   30049                         SYN if we are acking data from a remote host before our SYN  
                                   30050                         has been acked.                                              
                                   30051

 004E3A D203 6004 8034 00004 00034 30076  1                      MVC   TCPSEQ,TCBISS             Insure SEQ is ISS
 004E40 5820 8034            00034 30077  1                      L     R2,TCBISS                 Compute
 004E44 5E20 B596            0510C 30078  1                      INCR  R2                          end sequence
 004E48 58E0 B5B6/0DEE       0512C 30081  1                      ACALL CHECKMSS                  Set MSS value

                                   30172                         ACK delay logic

                                   30174                         If we have unACKed receive data, force sending of ACK  
                                   30175                           if one of the following conditions is true:

 004EA6 9504 8230/4780_00230       30229  1                      IF    (TCBSTATE,NE,ESTABLSH),'SET TCBFWRIT'

1AMELIA   XTIMEOUT - TCP transmit timeout routine                                                                           Page  129
0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
0                                  31077              
                                   31078                                                                                   
                                   31079                 XTIMEOUT -- TCP transmit timeout routine.                         
                                   31080                                                                                   
                                   31081                  Entered when packet not acknowledged within timer interval.      
                                   31082                   The connection will be aborted if data has not been             
                                   31083                   acknowledged within the interval specified by DEFTMOUT.         
                                   31084                   The connection will also be aborted if there has not been       
                                   31085                   a valid ACK within the TIMEOUT interval after we started        
                                   31086                   probing a closed window.                                        
                                   31087                                                                                   
                                   31088                  If we are opening a connection and the host has alternate        
                                   31089                   IP addresses, try these before aborting.                        
                                   31090                                                                                   
                                   31091                  If not aborting the connection, call the write routine to        
                                   31092                   initiate retransmitting.                                        
                                   31093                                                                                   
                                                      
0005178 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 31094              XTIMEOUT PROC
 USING  *,R11
 00519C 9500 8230/4780_00230       31136                       IF    (TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED),EXIT  Exit if killing connection
 0051A4 B205 D000      00000       31157                       STCK  @R13
 0051A8 5820 D000            00000 31158                       L     R2,@R13             Get current time
 0051AC 5F20 8090            00090 31159                       SL    R2,TCBXTIME         Minus transmit time
 0051B0 5810 8084            00084 31160                       L     R1,TCBTMOUT         Timeout value
 0051B4 9502 8230/4770_00230       31161                       IF    (TCBSTATE,EQ,SYNSENT),BEGIN  If doing active open,
 0051BC 4110 012C            0012C 31179  1                      LA    R1,DEFOPTMO                  Use default interval
 0051C0                            31180                       END
 0051C0 1921/47D0 B046             31184                       IF    (R2,GT,R1),BEGIN    If over timeout interval,
 0051C6 58E0 BDEC/0DEE       05F88 31199  1                      ACALL XOPENRST            Check if restart possible
 0051CC 4780 B046            051E2 31203  1                      IF    NZ,BEGIN            If not,
 0051D0 4110 BE92/4100_      0602E 31214  2                        SETMSG 'TIMEOUT'           Abort reason text
 0051D8 58E0 BDF0/0DEE       05F8C 31218  2                        ACALL ABORTTCB            Call abort routine
 0051DE 47F0 B068            05204 31222  2                        EXIT  XTIMEOUT            Return
 0051E2                            31225  1                      END
 0051E2                            31229                       END
                                   31233
 0051E2 9608 8231      00231       31234                       SET   TCBFTMO             Flag timeout occurred
 0051E6 D203 8074 8070 00074 00070 31240                       MVC   TCBCWIND,TCBSMSS    Reset congestion window
 0051EC 58E0 BDF4/0DEE       05F90 31241                       ACALL SENDTCP             Call write routine
 0051F2 5920 BDF8/47D0_      05F94 31245                       IF    (R2,GT,10),BEGIN    If interval over 10 seconds,
 0051FA 5810 8028            00028 31262  1                      L     R1,TCBIPADD         Get IP address
 0051FE 58E0 BDFC/0DEE       05F98 31263  1                      ACALL SENDARP             Send ARP packet
 005204                            31267                       END
 005204 18D9/980C D004_            31271                       PEND
 DROP   *,R11

1AMELIA   XMITTCP - Transmit TCP packet                                                                                     Page  132
0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11

0                                  31667              
                                   31668                                                                                   
                                   31669                 XMITTCP -- Transmit TCP packet.                                   
                                   31670                                                                                   
                                   31671                   Transmit TCP packet after computing the checksum.               
                                   31672                                                                                   
                                   31673                   On entry:                                                       
                                   31674                     R0,R1 - Packet length and address                             
                                   31675                     R15   - IP address of packet                                  
                                   31676                                                                                   
                                                      
0000000                00000 00020 31677              XMITTCPW RECORD BEGIN
 000000                            31685  1           XMTCPIPH   DS    CL(L'IPHDR)         IP header work area
 000014                            31686  1           XMTCPPHD   DS    CL12                TCP pseudo-header work area
 000020                00020 00020 31687                       END
-005324 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 31697              XMITTCP  PROC  XMITTCPW
 USING  *,R11
 USING  XMITTCPW-(4+52),R9
 005348 D71F 9038 9038 00000 00000 31750                       CLEAR XMITTCPW            Clear work area
 00534E 1821                       31757                       LR    R2,R1               Copy TCP header address
 005350 1830                       31758                       LR    R3,R0               Copy TCP packet length
 005352 184F                       31759                       LR    R4,R15              Copy IP address
                                   31760                       
                                   31761                         Build pseudo-header and compute TCP checksum.  
                                   31762                       
 USING  TCPHDR,R2                  31763                       WITH  (TCPHDR,R2)         Caller's TCP header
 005354 D701 2010 2010 00010 00010 31776                       CLEAR TCPCHK              Clear checksum
 00535A D203 904C C034 00014 00034 31783                       MVC   XMTCPPHD(4),NITIP   Build pseudo-header
 005360 5040 9050            00018 31784                       ST    R4,XMTCPPHD+4
 005364 D201 9054 BCDC 0001C 06024 31785                       MVC   XMTCPPHD+8(2),=Y(IPTCP#)
 00536A 4030 9056            0001E 31786                       STH   R3,XMTCPPHD+10
 00536E 4110 904C/4100_      00014 31787                       CHECKSUM XMTCPPHD,FINAL=NO  Checksum pseudo-header
 005380 1812/1803/58E0_            31810                       CHECKSUM (R2),(R3),(R15)    Checksum packet
 00538A 40F0 2010            00010 31830                       STH   R15,TCPCHK            Set checksum in header
                                   31831                       
                                   31832                         Build skeleton IP header and send packet.  
                                   31833                       
 00538E 4150 9038            00000 31834                       LA    R5,XMTCPIPH         IP work area
 USING  IPHDR,R5                   31835                       WITH  (IPHDR,R5)
 005392 9206 5009      00009       31848                       MVI   IPTYPE,IPTCP#       Protocol id
 005396 5040 5010            00010 31849                       ST    R4,IPDST            Dest IP address
 00539A 41F0 5000            00000 31850                       LA    R15,IPHDR           IP header address
 00539E 1803                       31851                       LR    R0,R3               TCP packet length
 0053A0 1812                       31852                       LR    R1,R2               TCP packet address
 0053A2 58E0 BC70/0DEE       05FB8 31853                       ACALL XMITIP              Call IP transmit routine
 0053A8 18D9/980C D004_            31857                       PEND
 DROP   IPHDR,R5
 DROP   TCPHDR,R2
 DROP   XMITTCPW-(4+52),R9
 DROP   *,R11

                                   31895                 NEWTCB -- Initialize new TCB and put on TCB chain.

                                   31898                     R1 - TCB address

00053B6 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 31900              NEWTCB   PROC
 USING  *,R11
 0053DA 4100 0233            00233 31942                       LA    R0,L'TCB            Area length
 0053DE 58E0 BBE2/0DEE       05FBC 31943                       ACALL GETCORE             Get memory
 0053E4 1881                       31947                       LR    TCBR,R1             Set TCB base
 0053E6 D7FF 8000 8000_00000 00000 31948                       CLEAR TCB
 0053F8 D203 8004 C0D0 00004 000D0 31957                       MVC   TCBNEXT,NITTCBQ     Put at head
 0053FE 5080 C0D0            000D0 31958                       ST    TCBR,NITTCBQ         of TCB chain
 005402 D203 8000 BBE6 00000 05FC0 31959                       MVC   TCBDMPID,=C'TCB '   Identifier for dumps
 005408 4100 0001/5E00_      00001 31960                       INCR  R0,NITTCBID         Get TCB id number
 005414 D203 8008 C0D4 00008 000D4 31966                       MVC   TCBID,NITTCBID      Set in TCB
 00541A 9200 8230      00230       31967                       MVI   TCBSTATE,CLOSED     Set state to CLOSED
 00541E D207 807C BB26 0007C 05F00 31968                       MVC   TCBFLOWL(8),=A(DEFFLOWL,DEFFLOWH)  Init flow control
 005424 D203 804C BBEA 0004C 05FC4 31969                       MVC   TCBRCVWN,=A(WINDOW)  Init receive window
 00542A D203 8098 BBCA 00098 05FA4 31970                       MVC   TCBRXTIM,=A(MINRXTIM)  Init retransmit timeout value
 005430 D203 809C BBCE 0009C 05FA8 31971                       MVC   TCBSRTT(4),=A(MINRXTIM/2) Init SRTT value
 005436 B205 D000      00000       31972                       STCK  @R13                Get time
 00543A D203 801C D000 0001C 00000 31973                       MVC   TCBSTART,@R13       Set connect start time
                                   31974                       
                                   31975                         Set value of ISS from bits 18-48 of TOD clock.       
                                   31976                         The high bit is is zero; the TCP code assumes        
                                   31977                         that our sequence number won't wrap, which is valid  
                                   31978                         unless we send over 2GB on a connection.             
                                   31979                       
 005440 9801 D000            00000 31980                       LM    R0,R1,@R13          Get time
 005444 8D00 0012            00012 31981                       SLDL  R0,18               Set R0 = bits 18-49
 005448 8800 0001            00001 31982                       SRL   R0,1                Set R0 = bits 18-48 (hi bit 0)
 00544C 5000 8034            00034 31983                       ST    R0,TCBISS           Set ISS
 005450 5000 8050            00050 31984                       ST    R0,TCBSNDUN         Set SND.UNA to ISS
 005454 5000 8054            00054 31985                       ST    R0,TCBSNDNX         Set SND.NXT to ISS
 005458 5E00 BBEE            05FC8 31986                       INCR  R0
 00545C 5000 8058            00058 31989                       ST    R0,TCBSNDFN         Init final sequence number
                                   31990                       
                                   31991                         Initialize trace table  
                                   31992                       
 005460 D603 C0F8 C0F8_000F8 000F8 31993                       IF    (NITTCPTC,NZ),BEGIN  If tracing set,
 00546A 5830 C0F4            000F4 32009  1                      L     R3,NITTCPTL         Get trace data length
 00546E 4133 000C            0000C 32010  1                      LA    R3,L'TCBTRHDR(R3)   Add header length
 005472 5030 80FC            000FC 32011  1                      ST    R3,TCBTRELN         Save entry length value
 005476 5C20 C0F8            000F8 32012  1                      M     R2,NITTCPTC         Times entry count
 00547A 5030 8100            00100 32013  1                      ST    R3,TCBTRTLN         Save table length
 00547E 1803                       32014  1                      LR    R0,R3               Copy count
 005480 5900 BBF2/47A0_      05FCC 32015  1                      IF    (R0,GE,GETCMAX),EXIT  ** EXIT IF TOO BIG **
 005488 58E0 BBE2/0DEE       05FBC 32035  1                      ACALL GETCORE             Get storage for trace table
 00548E 5010 80F4            000F4 32039  1                      ST    R1,TCBTRADD         Save trace table address

 USING  *,R11

 0054F4 D603 8070 8070_00070 00070 32140                       IF    (TCBSMSS,Z),BEGIN     If no send MSS from remote host,
 0054FE D203 8070 BAEA 00070 05FD8 32156  1                      MVC   TCBSMSS,=A(512)       Set default of 512
 005504                            32157                       END
 005504 D503 BAEE 8070_05FDC 00070 32161                       IF    (TCBSMSS,GT,MAXTCPLN),BEGIN  If MSS gt max TCP size,
 00550E D203 8070 BAE6 00070 05FD4 32179  1                      MVC   TCBSMSS,=A(MAXTCPLN)         Set to max TCP size
 005514                            32180                       END
                                   32184                       
                                   32185                         If connection is not to the local network (as defined by   
                                   32186                         NITLMASK), truncate MSS values to 964 so packets don't     
                                   32187                         exceed the IMP MTU of 1006, to avoid packet fragmentation  
                                   32188                         by external gateways.                                      
                                   32189                       
 005514 5800 C034            00034 32190                       L     R0,NITIP            Our IP address
 005518 5810 8028            00028 32191                       L     R1,TCBIPADD         Remote host IP address
 00551C 5400 C044            00044 32192                       N     R0,NITLMASK         Isolate local net
 005520 5410 C044            00044 32193                       N     R1,NITLMASK
 005524 1901/4780 B052             32194                       IF    (R0,NE,R1),BEGIN    If not local net,
 00552A D203 806C BAF2 0006C 05FE0 32209  1                      MVC   TCBRMSS,=A(964)     Reset our receive MSS
 005530 D503 BAF6 8070_05FE4 00070 32210  1                      IF    (TCBSMSS,GT,964),'MVC TCBSMSS,=A(964)'
 005540                            32234                       END
 005540 18D9/980C D004_            32238                       PEND
 DROP   *,R11

0                                  32890              
                                   32891                                                                                   
                                   32892                 KILLTCB - process KILL command.                                   
                                   32893                                                                                   
                                   32894                   On entry:                                                       
                                   32895                     R1  - TCB id                                                  
                                   32896                                                                                   
                                   32897                   On exit:

 005712 58E0 B8F4/0DEE       06004 32943                       ACALL GETTCB              Get TCB address
 005718 4770 B014/41F0_      05724 32947                       IF    Z,'LA R15,4; EXIT KILLTCB'  Check for bad id
 005724 188F                       32967                       LR    TCBR,R15            Copy TCB address
                                   32968
 005726 58E0 B8F8/0DEE       06008 32969                       ACALL SENDRST             Will send RST if have rmt host

 00572C 9140 8231/47E0_00231                                         (TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED)),BEGIN    or dead TCB
 00573C 58E0 B8F0/0DEE       06000 33005  1                      ACALL DELTCB                       Just delete it
 005742                            33009                       END

 005754                            33032                       END

 0057A6 5810 802C            0002C 33151  1                      L     R1,TCBIPCHN

 0057B6 47F0 B014            0579C 33157                       END
                                   33162

 0057BA D603 80B0 80B0_000B0 000B0 33176                       WHILE (TCBSENDQ,NZ),BEGIN   Free send queue entries
 0057C4 5810 80B0            000B0 33194  1                      L     R1,TCBSENDQ

 0057F2 47F0 B050            057D8 33230                       END
                                   33235
 0057F6 D603 80B8 80B8_000B8 000B8 33236                       WHILE (TCBOUTSQ,NZ),BEGIN   Free out-of-seq queue entries
 005800 5810 80B8            000B8 33254  1                      L     R1,TCBOUTSQ
 005804 D203 80B8 1000 000B8 00000 33255  1                      MVC   TCBOUTSQ,TCBQNEXT
 00580A 58E0 B814/0DEE       05F9C 33256  1                      ACALL FREECORE
 005810 47F0 B06E            057F6 33260                       END
                                   33265
 005814 D603 80F4 80F4_000F4 000F4 33266                       IF    (TCBTRADD,NZ),BEGIN   Free trace table
 00581E 5810 80F4            000F4 33282  1                      L     R1,TCBTRADD
 005822 58E0 B814/0DEE       05F9C 33283  1                      ACALL FREECORE
 005828                            33287                       END

                                   33298                       
                                   33299                         Delete TCB from TCBID hash queue  
                                   33300                       
 005828 5810 8008/1B00_      00008 33301                       TIDHASH TCBID=TCBID       Get hash queue head
 00583C 58F0 1000            00000 33314                       L     R15,@R1             Get first TCB in queue (or 0)
 005840 19F8/4770 B0C4             33315                       IF    (R15,EQ,TCBR),BEGIN  If this TCB at head of q,
 005846 D203 1000 8018 00000 00018 33330  1                      MVC   @R1(4),TCBTIDHQ      Dequeue our TCB
 00584C                            33331                       END
 00584C B0C8/47F0 B0F6 0584C 05844 33335                       ELSE  BEGIN               Else search queue
 005850                            33346  1           DELTCBID   LOOP  BEGIN
 005850 D503 B838 F000_05FC0 00000 33353  2                        IF    (@R15,NE,'TCB '),'FAIL "TCBID HASH Q ERROR"'
 005864 598F 0018/4770_      00018 33378  2                        IF    (TCBR,EQ,TCBTIDHQ-TCB(R15)),BEGIN  If found match,
 00586C D203 F018 8018 00018 00018 33395  3                          MVC   TCBTIDHQ-TCB(,R15),TCBTIDHQ         Dequeue TCB
 005872 47F0 B0F6            0587E 33396  3                          EXIT  DELTCBID
 005876                            33399  2                        END

1AMELIA   TCPTIMER - TCP timer routine                                                                                      Page  142
0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
0                                  33606              
                                   33607                                                                                   
                                   33608                 TCPTIMER -- TCP timer routine, entered at 1  second intervals.    
                                   33609                             For each TCB, decrement  current timer value and      
                                   33610                             enter the timer routine if the timer has expired.     
                                   33611                                                                                   
                                   33612                             Also checks to see if keepalive packet should be      
                                   33613                             sent to the remote host.                              
                                   33614                                                                                   
                                                      
0005922 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 33615              TCPTIMER PROC
 USING  *,R11
 005946 1B55                       33657                       CLEAR R5                  Clear debug reg
 005948 5860 C0D0            000D0 33661                       L     R6,NITTCBQ          TCB queue head
 00594C 1266/4780 B162             33662              TCPTMNXT WHILE (R6,NZ),BEGIN
 005952 1858                       33679  1                      LR    R5,TCBR             Save prev for debugging
 005954 1886                       33680  1                      LR    TCBR,R6             Set current TCB base
 005956 5860 8004            00004 33681  1                      L     R6,TCBNEXT          Get next TCB address
                                   33682  1
 00595A D503 B67A 8000_05FC0 00000 33683  1                      IF    (TCB,NE,'TCB '),BEGIN
 005964 0ADE/08FF00008_            33700  2                        QSNAP TCB,255
 00596C D217 C21C B62A_0021C 05F70 33704  2                        FAIL  'Bad TCB chain'
 005976                            33708  1                      END
                                   33712  1
 005976 5800 80A8            000A8 33713  1                      L     R0,TCBTIMER         Get timer value
 00597A 1200/47D0 B050             33714  1                      IF    (R0,P),BEGIN        If timer set,
 005980 0600                       33728  2                        DECR  R0                  Decrement
 005982 5000 80A8            000A8 33730  2                        ST    R0,TCBTIMER         Set new value
 005986 1200/4770 B04C             33731  2                        IF    (R0,Z),BEGIN        If timer expired,
 00598C 58F0 80AC            000AC 33745  3                          L     R15,TCBTMXIT        Get timer exit address
 005990 05EF                       33746  3                          BALR  R14,R15             Enter timer exit routine
 005992                            33747  2                        END
 005992 47F0 B006            0594C 33751  2                        B     TCPTMNXT            Go to next TCB
 005996                            33752  1                      END
                                   33756  1                      
                                   33757  1                        Check for idle timeout on connection  
                                   33758  1                      
 005996 D603 8088 8088_00088 00088 33759  1                      IF    (TCBIDLTM,NZ),BEGIN   If idle timeout interval set,
 0059A0 9500 8230/4780_00230       33775  2                        IF    (TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED),EXIT  Skip if closed
 0059A8 9501 8230/4780_00230       33796  2                        IF    (TCBSTATE,EQ,LISTEN),EXIT  Skip if listen TCB
 0059B0 5800 C344            00344 33817  2                        L     R0,NITCLOCK         Compute interval since
 0059B4 5F00 8110            00110 33818  2                        SL    R0,TCBSDATT           last data transmit
 0059B8 5810 C344            00344 33819  2                        L     R1,NITCLOCK         Compute interval since
 0059BC 5F10 81A4            001A4 33820  2                        SL    R1,TCBRDATT           last data received
                                   33821  2         C              IF    (('CL R0,TCBIDLTM',H),AND,  If both are over
 0059C0 5500 8088/47D0_      00088        2                              ('CL R1,TCBIDLTM',H)),BEGIN    idle time limit,
 0059D0 4110 B702/4100_      06048 33846  3                          SEGWR 'Idle time exceeded for connection',,NITPRSG
 0059E2 1B00                       33864  3                          CLEAR R0                  Standard format requested
 0059E4 1818                       33868  3                          LR    R1,TCBR             TCB address
 0059E6 41F0 C4B0            004B0 33869  3                          LA    R15,NITPRSG         SEGCB
 0059EA 58E0 B6CA/0DEE       06010 33870  3                          ACALL FMTTCB              Log TCB info
 0059F0 4110 B6E8/4100_      0602E 33874  3                          SETMSG 'TIMEOUT'           Do timeout abort
 0059F8 58E0 B646/0DEE       05F8C 33878  3                          ACALL ABORTTCB

 005A02                            33883  2                        END
 005A02                            33887  1                      END
                                   33891  1

 005A14 D503 8050 8054_00050 00054 33931  2                        IF    (TCBSNDUN,LT,TCBSNDNX),EXIT  Skip if unacked data
 005A1E D503 8058 8054_00058 00054 33952  2                        IF    (TCBSNDFN,EQ,TCBSNDNX),EXIT  Skip if no unsent data
 005A28 5800 C344            00344 33973  2                        L     R0,NITCLOCK              Get time since

 005A38 9602 8232      00232       33992  3                          SET   TCBFXKPA                 Flag transmit keepalive
 005A3C 58E0 B64A/0DEE       05F90 33998  3                          ACALL SENDTCP                  Send packet to check window
 005A42 47F0 B006            0594C 34002  3                          B     TCPTMNXT                 Go to next TCB
 005A46                            34003  2                        END
 005A46                            34007  1                      END
                                   34011  1

 005A4E 9500 8230/4780_00230       34029  2                        IF    (TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED),EXIT  Skip if closed
 005A56 D503 8050 8054_00050 00054 34050  2                        IF    (TCBSNDUN,LT,TCBSNDNX),EXIT  Skip if unacked data
 005A60 5800 C344            00344 34071  2                        L     R0,NITCLOCK         Compute time since

 005A78 58E0 B646/0DEE       05F8C 34094  3                          ACALL ABORTTCB             of connection
 005A7E                            34098  2                        END

 005AA4                            34165  1                      END

1AMELIA   GETSRTT - Get TCP retransmit time interval                                                                        Page  144
0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
0                                  34195              
                                   34196                                                                                   
                                   34197                 GETSRTT - Compute smoothed retransmit time interval               
                                   34198                                                                                   
                                   34199                  Implements the retransmit time algorithm from RFC-889            
                                   34200                                                                                   
                                   34201                  Smoothed round-trip time computed from the formula               
                                   34202                                                                                   
                                   34203                         SRTT = SRTT*(1-f) + f*RTT                                 
                                   34204                     or  SRTT = f*(RTT-SRTT) + SRTT                                
                                   34205                                                                                   
                                   34206                       f = 1/16  RTT lt SRTT                                       
                                   34207                       f = 1/4   RTT ge SRTT                                       
                                   34208                                                                                   
                                                      
0005AB6 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 34209              GETSRTT  PROC
 USING  *,R11
 005ADA B205 D000      00000       34251                       STCK  @R13                Get current time
 005ADE 9801 D000            00000 34252                       LM    R0,R1,@R13
 005AE2 5F10 8094/47B0_      00094 34253                       SDL   R0,TCBXTIME         Get packet round-trip time
 005AF0 5F10 80A0/47B0_      000A0 34258                       SDL   R0,R1,TCBSRTT       Get RTT-SRTT
 005AFE 1200/47B0 B02E             34263                       IF    (R0,M),BEGIN        If RTT lt SRTT,
 005B04 8E00 0004            00004 34277  1                      SRDA  R0,4                Use f = 1/16
 005B08                            34278                       END
 005B08 B032/47F0 B036 05B08 05B02 34282                       ELSE  BEGIN               Else RTT ge SRTT,
 005B0C 8E00 0002            00002 34293  1                      SRDA  R0,2                Use f = 1/4
 005B10                            34294                       END
                                   34298
 005B10 5E10 80A0/47C0_      000A0 34299                       ADL   R0,TCBSRTT          Compute new SRTT
 005B20 5900 B53A/47D0_      06014 34320                       CEIL  R0,MAXSRTT          Keep from getting too large
 005B2C 9001 809C            0009C 34339                       STM   R0,R1,TCBSRTT       Save in TCB
 005B30 18D9/980C D004_            34340                       PEND
 DROP   *,R11
1AMELIA   GETTCB - Get TCB address from TCB id                                                                              Page  145
0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)

0                                  34361              
                                   34362                                                                                   
                                   34363                 GETTCB -- Get TCB address using TCBID                             
                                   34364                                                                                   
                                   34365                   On entry:                                                       
                                   34366                     R15 = TCB id                                                  
                                   34367                                                                                   
                                   34368                   On exit:                                                        
                                   34369                     R15 = TCB address (or zero)                                   
                                   34370                                                                                   
                                                      
0005B3E 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 34371              GETTCB   PROC
 USING  *,R11
 005B62 182F                       34413                       LR    R2,R15              Copy TCB id
 005B64 1812/1B00/5D00_            34414                       TIDHASH TCBID=(R2)        Get hash queue head
 005B76 5880 1000            00000 34427                       L     TCBR,@R1            Get first TCB in queue
                                   34428            C          WHILE ((TCBR,NZ),AND,     Look for matching ID
 005B7A 1288/4780 B02E_                                              (R2,NE,TCBID)),'L TCBR,TCBTIDHQ'
 005B90 18F8                       34467                       LR    R15,TCBR            Return TCB addr (or zero)
 005B92 18D9/980C D004_            34468                       PEND

0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)

0                                  34489              
                                   34490                                                                                   
                                   34491                 SENDPATH -- Send message over path                                
                                   34492                                                                                   
                                   34493                   On entry, message contained in path SEG buffer.  If we          
                                   34494                    can't send the message, add it to the TCB path queue.          
                                   34495                                                                                   
                                                      
0005BA0 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 34496              SENDPATH PROC
 USING  *,R11
 005BC4 4150 C1EC            001EC 34538                       LA    R5,NITPSG           Path SEGCB address
 USING  SEGCB,R5                   34539                       WITH  (SEGCB,R5)
 005BC8 5820 5010            00010 34552                       L     R2,SEGCBLOC         Get data address
 005BCC 4830 5006            00006 34553                       LH    R3,SEGCBLEN         Get data length
 005BD0 D603 80B4 80B4_000B4 000B4 34554                       IF    (TCBPATHQ,Z),BEGIN  If path queue empty,
                                   34570  1         C            IF    (~TCBFUID,AND,      Don't send if no user path id
 005BDA 9140 8231/4710_00231              1                            (@R2,NE,'TCP_CONNECT')),EXIT  and not connect msg,
                                   34603  1         C            IF    (TCBFXOFF,AND,      Exit if received TCP_STOP
 005BEC 9101 8231/47E0_00231              1                            (@R2,NE,'TCP_START')),EXIT   and not TCP_START msg
 005BFE 5860 C124            00124 34636  1                      L     R6,NITPCUR          Save current path id
 005C02 D203 C124 8010 00124 00010 34637  1                      MVC   NITPCUR,TCBPATH     Set current path id
 005C08 1B00/18F5/58E0_            34638  1                      SEGWR ,,(R5)              Try to send data
 005C12 5060 C124            00124 34660  1                      ST    R6,NITPCUR          Restore current path id
                                   34661  1
 005C16 1803                       34662  1                      LR    R0,R3               Copy msg len
 005C18 1812                       34663  1                      LR    R1,R2               Copy msg pointer
 005C1A 58E0 B3E8/0DEE       05FAC 34664  1                      ACALL TCPTRACE            Call trace routine
                                   34668  1
 005C20 59F0 B454/4780_      06018 34669  1                      IF    (R15,NE,UPATRBAF),'EXIT SENDPATH'  Exit if not full q,
 005C2C                            34694                       END
                                   34698                       
                                   34699                         Add message to TCB path queue.  
                                   34700                       
 005C2C 4140 80B4            000B4 34701                       LA    R4,TCBPATHQ-(TCBQNEXT-TCBQHDR)
 USING  TCBQHDR,R4                 34702                       WITH  (TCBQHDR,R4)
 005C30 D603 4000 4000_00000 00000 34715                       WHILE (TCBQNEXT,NZ),'L R4,TCBQNEXT'  Find end of queue
 005C42 4103 000C            0000C 34740                       LA    R0,L'TCBQHDR(R3)    Queue entry length
 005C46 58E0 B458/0DEE       0601C 34741                       ACALL GETBUF              Get memory
 005C4C 5010 4000            00000 34745                       ST    R1,TCBQNEXT         Chain area to end of queue
 005C50 1841                       34746                       LR    R4,R1               New TCBQ pointer
 005C52 D703 4000 4000 00000 00000 34747                       CLEAR TCBQNEXT            Clear chain pointer
 005C58 5030 4004            00004 34754                       ST    R3,TCBQLEN          Set data length
 005C5C 41E0 400C/18F3_      0000C 34755                       MOVEL TCBQDATA,(R2),(R3)  Move data to buffer
 005C68 18F5/58E0 B45C_            34775                       SEGCLR (R5)               Clear SEGCB
 005C70 18D9/980C D004_            34786                       PEND

 DROP   *,R11

1AMELIA   TCPFULLQ -- TCP path full queue cleared routine                                                                   Page  148
0Current Usings:  (TCB,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11

0                                  35086              
                                   35087                                                                                   
                                   35088                 TCPFULLQ -- Called when path full queue condition cleared.        
                                   35089                                                                                   
                                   35090                   On entry:                                                       
                                   35091                     R1  - path address                                            
                                   35092                                                                                   
                                                      
0005D3A 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 35093              TCPFULLQ PROC
 USING  *,R11
 005D5E 1821                       35135                       LR    R2,R1               Copy path address
 005D60 5880 C0D0            000D0 35136                       L     TCBR,NITTCBQ        TCB queue head
 005D64 1288/4780 B04E             35137                       WHILE (TCBR,NZ),BEGIN
 005D6A 5830 8004            00004 35153  1                      L     R3,TCBNEXT          Save next TCB address
                                   35154  1         C            IF    ((R2,EQ,TCBPATH),AND,  If path address match
 005D6E 5920 8010/4770_      00010        1                            (TCBPATHQ,NZ)),BEGIN    and data queued for path,
 005D80 58E0 B29A/0DEE       05FF8 35186  2                        ACALL SNDPATHQ              Try to send it now
                                   35190  2         C              IF    (TCBFSCLO,AND,          If CLOSE message sent,
                                          2         C                    (TCBSTATE,EQ,CLOSED),AND, and connection closed
 005D86 9110 8232/47E0_00232              2                              (TCBPATHQ,Z)),BEGIN         and path queue empty,
 005DA0 58E0 B2A2/0DEE       06000 35235  3                          ACALL DELTCB                        Delete TCB now
 005DA6                            35239  2                        END
 005DA6                            35243  1                      END
 005DA6 1883                       35247  1                      LR    TCBR,R3             Next TCB address
 005DA8 47F0 B006            05D64 35248                       END
 005DAC 18D9/980C D004_            35253                       PEND

0                                  35401              
                                   35402                                                                                   
                                   35403                 TCPTRACE -- TCP connection trace routine                          
                                   35404                                                                                   
                                   35405                   On entry:                                                       
                                   35406                     R0  - data length                                             
                                   35407                     R1  - data pointer                                            
                                   35408                     R15 - trace code                                              
                                   35409                                                                                   
                                   35410                 The trace code on entry will either be a path send return         
                                   35411                 code (low numbers) or one of the codes defined in the             
                                   35412                 TCBTRHDR DSECT.                                                   
                                   35413                                                                                   
                                                      
0005E16 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 35414              TCPTRACE PROC
 USING  *,R11
 005E3A D603 80F4 80F4_000F4 000F4 35456                       IF    (TCBTRADD,Z),EXIT   Return if no tracing
 005E44 5820 80F8            000F8 35475                       L     R2,TCBTRPTR         Get path msg trace ptr
 005E48 5A20 80F4            000F4 35476                       A     R2,TCBTRADD         Point to trace table entry
 USING  TCBTRHDR,R2                35477                       WITH  (TCBTRHDR,R2)
 005E4C B205 2000      00000       35490                       STCK  TCBTRTIM            Time stamp
 005E50 40F0 2008            00008 35491                       STH   R15,TCBTRTYP        Type code
 005E54 4000 200A            0000A 35492                       STH   R0,TCBTRLEN         Message length
 005E58 1830                       35493                       LR    R3,R0               Copy length
 005E5A 5840 80FC            000FC 35494                       L     R4,TCBTRELN         Entry length
 005E5E 4B40 B1F2            0602C 35495                       SH    R4,=Y(L'TCBTRHDR)   Minus header length
 005E62 1934/47D0 B030_            35496                       IF    (R3,GT,R4),'LR R3,R4'  Truncate length
 005E6A 0630/1233/4740_            35517                       DTEX  R3,'MVC TCBTRDAT(0),@R1'  Move in trace data
                                   35554
 005E76 5820 80F8            000F8 35555                       L     R2,TCBTRPTR         Get path msg trace ptr
 005E7A 5A20 80FC            000FC 35556                       A     R2,TCBTRELN         Point to next entry
 005E7E 5920 8100/4750_      00100 35557                       IF    (R2,GE,TCBTRTLN),'CLEAR R2' Check for wrap
 005E88 5020 80F8            000F8 35583                       ST    R2,TCBTRPTR         Update trace pointer
 005E8C 18D9/980C D004_            35584                       PEND

                                   35863

                                   35865                     R0  - TCP port number                                         
                                   35866                     R1  - addr of port statistics queue head

0006084 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 35868              COUNTTCP PROC
 USING  *,R11
                                   35910                       
                                   35911                         Search port statistics table for matching entry.  Each    
                                   35912                          chained table entry contains a port number plus counter  
                                   35913                       
 0060A8 5820 1000            00000 35914                       L     R2,@R1              Get first entry
 0060AC 1831                       35915                       LR    R3,R1               Init prev entry pointer
 0060AE 1840                       35916                       LR    R4,R0               Save port number
 0060B0 1222/4780 B034             35917                       WHILE (R2,NZ),BEGIN       Search queue
 0060B6 5940 2004            00004 35933  1                      C     R4,@R2+4            Compare port number
 0060BA 4740 B034            060DC 35934  1                      IF    L,EXIT              Exit if past possible match
 0060BE 4770 B02A            060D2 35948  1                      IF    EQ,BEGIN            If found matching entry,
 0060C2 4100 0001            00001 35959  2                        LA    R0,1                Incr counter
 0060C6 5A00 2008            00008 35960  2                        A     R0,@R2+8
 0060CA 5000 2008            00008 35961  2                        ST    R0,@R2+8
 0060CE 47F0 B050            060F8 35962  2                        EXIT  COUNTTCP            Return
 0060D2                            35965  1                      END
 0060D2 1832                       35969  1                      LR    R3,R2               Update prev entry pointer
 0060D4 5820 2000            00000 35970  1                      L     R2,@R2              Chain to next entry
 0060D8 47F0 B008            060B0 35971                       END
                                   35976                       
                                   35977                         Matching entry not found, add new entry to queue  
                                   35978                       
 0060DC 4100 000C/4510_      0000C 35979                       GETMAIN R,LV=12           Get storage
 0060E6 5010 3000            00000 35984                       ST    R1,@R3              Chain new to prev
 0060EA 5020 1000            00000 35985                       ST    R2,@R1              Chain next to new
 0060EE 5040 1004            00004 35986                       ST    R4,@R1+4            Set port number in new entry
 0060F2 D203 1008 B060 00008 06108 35987                       MVC   @R1+8(4),=A(1)      Init counter
 0060F8 18D9/980C D004_            35988                       PEND
 DROP   *,R11

                                   36009                       QLTORG
