0                                  36023              
                                   36024                                                                                   
                                   36025                 GETHOST -- Look up IP address in host table.                      
                                   36026

                                   36029

 USING  *,R11
 006130 1861                       36076                       LR    R6,R1               Save IP address
 006132 1C06                       36077                       MR    R0,R6               Hash IP address
 006134 1710                       36078                       XR    R1,R0
 006136 1B00                       36079                       CLEAR R0
 006138 5D00 B270            063A0 36083                       D     R0,=A(HASHSIZE)
 00613C 1820                       36084                       LR    R2,R0               Get remainder
 00613E 8920 0002            00002 36085                       SLL   R2,2                *4 for hash table offset
 006142 5A20 C098            00098 36086                       A     R2,NITHSTHT         Point to hash queue head
 006146 5810 2000            00000 36087                       L     R1,@R2              Get first HST entry
                                   36088
 00614A 1211/4780 B030             36089                       WHILE (R1,NZ),BEGIN

 006150 5960 1008/4780_      00008 36118  1                      IF    (R6,EQ,HSTIPADD),EXIT  Exit if IP address match
 006158 5810 1004            00004 36138  1                      L     R1,HSTHASHP            Chain to next hash q entry
 00615C 47F0 B01A            0614A 36139                       END

                                   36149
 006160 1211/4770 B03A             36150                       IF    (R1,Z),BEGIN        If no entry,
 006166 41F0 0004            00004 36164  1                      LA    R15,4               Return code = 4
 00616A                            36165                       END
 00616A B03E/47F0 B040 0616A 06164 36169                       ELSE  BEGIN               Else have entry,
 00616E 1BFF                       36180  1                      CLEAR R15                 Return code = 0
 006170                            36184                       END

 006174 18D9/980C D004_            36190                       PEND

1AMELIA   GETENET - Get Ethernet address for host                                                                           Page  156
0Current Usings:  (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
0                                  36473              
                                   36474                                                                                   
                                   36475                 GETENET -- Look up Ethernet address in host table.                
                                   36476                           If the address is unknown, send an ARP request          
                                   36477                           packet to get the address.                              
                                   36478                                                                                   
                                   36479                           If the IP address is not in our subnet then             
                                   36480                           this routine returns the Ethernet address of            
                                   36481                           the gateway defined in NITGATE.                         
                                   36482                                                                                   
                                   36483                   On entry:                                                       
                                   36484                     R1 = IP address                                               
                                   36485                                                                                   
                                   36486                   On exit:                                                        
                                   36487                     CC=Z   R0,R1 = Ethernet address                               
                                   36488                     CC=NZ  Address not found.                                     
                                   36489                                                                                   
                                                      
0006250 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 36490              GETENET  PROC
 USING  *,R11
                                   36532                       
                                   36533                         Handle immediately if our IP address (or "loopback" addr).  
                                   36534                       
 006274 5910 C034/4770_      00034 36535                       IF    (R1,EQ,NITIP),BEGIN
 00627C BF0F C693            00693 36552  1                      L4    R0,NITETHER         Get
 006280 1F11/BF13 C697             36554  1                      L2    R1,NITETHER+4         our
 006286 8910 0010            00010 36562  1                      SLL   R1,16                   ethernet address
 00628A 9001 9004            00004 36563  1                      PRETURN (R0,R1)
 00628E 1BFF                       36565  1                      CLEAR R15                 Good rc
 006290 47F0 B08C            06300 36569  1                      EXIT  GETENET
 006294                            36572                       END
                                   36576                       
                                   36577                         If IP address is not in our subnet, use gateway address.  
                                   36578                       
 006294 D603 C040 C040_00040 00040 36579                       IF    (NITGATE,NZ),BEGIN  If have gateway address,
 00629E 1801                       36595  1                      LR    R0,R1               Copy IP address
 0062A0 5400 C03C            0003C 36596  1                      N     R0,NITMASK          Isolate subnet
 0062A4 5900 C038/4780_      00038 36597  1                      IF    (R0,NE,NITSUBNT),BEGIN    If not our subnet,
 0062AC 5810 C040            00040 36614  2                        L     R1,NITGATE                Use gateway address
 0062B0                            36615  1                      END
 0062B0                            36619                       END
 0062B0 1821                       36623                       LR    R2,R1               Save address
 0062B2 58E0 B138/0DEE       063AC 36624                       ACALL GETHOST             Look up address in host table
 0062B8 1831                       36628                       LR    R3,R1
 USING  HSTTABLE,R3                36629                       WITH  (HSTTABLE,R3)
                                   36642            C          IF    ((R3,Z),OR,         If no host table entry, or
 0062BA 1233/4780 B056_                                              (HSTENET,Z)),BEGIN   or no ethernet address,
 0062CA 1812                       36671  1                      LR    R1,R2               IP address
 0062CC 58E0 B13C/0DEE       063B0 36672  1                      ACALL SENDARP             Send ARP request
 0062D2 41F0 0004            00004 36676  1                      LA    R15,4               Set RC
 0062D6 47F0 B08C            06300 36677  1                      EXIT  GETENET             Return
 0062DA                            36680                       END
                                   36684
1AMELIA   GETENET - Get Ethernet address for host                                                                           Page  157
0Current Usings:  (HSTTABLE,R3) (*,R11) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________

 0062DE 5800 D000            00000 36686                       L     R0,@R13               since last Ethernet

0Current Usings:  (NIT,R12)

0                                  36747              
                                   36748                                                                                   
                                   36749                  SENDARP -- Send ARP request packet                               
                                   36750                                                                                   
                                   36751                    On entry:                                                      
                                   36752                      R1 = IP address                                              
                                   36753                                                                                   
                                                      
000630E 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 36754              SENDARP  PROC
 USING  *,R11
 006332 186D/41D0 D02C             36796                       XPUSH ,,L'ENETHDR+L'ARP,PTR=R6  Packet work area
 USING  ENETHDR,R6                 36799                       WITH  (ENETHDR,R6)        Ethernet header
 006338 D205 6000 B08A 00000 063BC 36812                       MVC   ENETDST,=6X'FF'     Broadcast address
 00633E D205 6006 C693 00006 00693 36813                       MVC   ENETSRC,NITETHER    Our Ethernet address
 006344 D201 600C B090 0000C 063C2 36814                       MVC   ENETTYPE,=Y(ENETARP#)  Packet type
 00634A 4150 600E            0000E 36815                       LA    R5,ENETDATA         Start of ARP packet
 USING  ARP,R5                     36816                       WITH  (ARP,R5)
 00634E D201 5000 B092 00000 063C4 36829                       MVC   ARPHRD,=Y(ARPENET#) Hardware address type
 006354 D201 5002 B094 00002 063C6 36830                       MVC   ARPPRO,=Y(ENETIP#)  Protocal address type
 00635A 9206 5004      00004       36831                       MVI   ARPHLN,6            Hardware address length
 00635E 9204 5005      00005       36832                       MVI   ARPPLN,4            Protocol address length
 006362 D201 5006 B096 00006 063C8 36833                       MVC   ARPOP,=Y(ARPREQ#)   Operation code
 006368 D205 5008 C693 00008 00693 36834                       MVC   ARPSHA,NITETHER     Source hardware address
 00636E D203 500E C034 0000E 00034 36835                       MVC   ARPSPA,NITIP        Source protocol address
 006374 D705 5012 5012 00012 00012 36836                       CLEAR ARPTHA              Target hardware address
 00637A 5010 5018            00018 36843                       ST    R1,ARPTPA           Target protocol address
                                   36844
 00637E 1816/4100 002A_            36845                       SEGWR (R6),L'ENETHDR+L'ARP,NITOSG  Write packet
 00638E 18D9/980C D004_            36873                       PEND
 DROP   ARP,R5

                                   36931                NSLOOKUP - Initiate name server lookup                             
                                   36932                                                                                   
                                   36933                  On entry:                                                        
                                   36934                      R1  - Addr of name server lookup queue entry.

0                                  42388              
                                   42389                                                                                   
                                   42390                ADDHNT -- Add entry to host name table                             
                                   42391                                                                                   
                                   42392                  On entry:                                                        
                                   42393                      R1  - Parm list pointer (fullwords):                         
                                   42394                             +00 Entry type (resource record type)                 
                                   42395                             +04 Time to live value (seconds)                      
                                   42396                             +08 IP address (A entry)                              
                                   42397                             +12 Name pointer                                      
                                   42398                             +16 Name length                                       
                                   42399                             +20 Second name pointer (MX or CNAME only)            
                                   42400                             +24 Second name length (MX or CNAME only)             
                                   42401                             +28 MX record preference                              
                                   42402                                                                                   
                                   42403                  On exit:                                                         
                                   42404                      R15 - RC (0=OK, 4=Invalid call, 8=Duplicate entry)           
                                   42405                                                                                   
                                                      
0000000                00000 0020B 42406              ADDHNTW  RECORD BEGIN
 000000                            42414  1           ADDHNAME   DS    CL256               Host name
 000100                            42415  1           ADDHNLN2   DS    F                   Second name length
 000104                            42416  1           ADDHNAM2   DS    CL256               Second name
 000204                            42417  1           ADDHEXPT   DS    F                   Expiration time
 000208                            42418  1           ADDHTYPE   DS    X                   Entry type
 000209                            42419  1           ADDHMXPR   DS    XL2                 MX preference
 00020B                0020B 0020B 42420                       END
                                   42429

                                   48130                PC -- Patch core command.                                          
                                   48131                                                                                   
                                   48132                The syntax for the command is:                                     
                                   48133                  PC hexaddr|symbol [+ nnn] [replacement data]                     
                                   48134

 000108                00108 00108 48148                       END

0                                  49779              
                                   49780                                                                                   
                                   49781                 SHOW HASH -- Show hash table info                                 
                                   49782                                                                                   
                                                      
0008804                            49783              SHOWHASH LABEL
                                   49785              **       SEGB  'TCBID hash table at'
                                   49786              **       SEGHX L:NITTIDHT,8
                                   49787              **       SEGWR ,
                                   49788              **       L     R2,NITTIDHT         TCBID hash table addr
                                   49789              **       CLEAR R3                  Counter
                                   49790              **       WHILE (R3,LT,HASHSIZE),BEGIN
                                   49791              **       CLEAR R4                  Counter
                                   49792              **       L     R15,@R2             Get 1st TCB addr
                                   49793              **       WHILE (R15,NZ),BEGIN      Count TCBs
                                   49794              **       INCR  R4
                                   49795              **       L     R15,TCBTIDHQ-TCB(R15)
                                   49796              **       END
                                   49797              **       IF    (R4,NZ),BEGIN       If found TCBs,
                                   49798              **       SEGDC (R3),4              Hash table index
                                   49799              **       SEGDC (R4),3              Entry count
                                   49800              **       SEGWR ,
                                   49801              **       END
                                   49802              **       LA    R2,4(R2)            Incr hash table ptr
                                   49803              **       INCR  R3                  Incr hash table counter
                                   49804              **       END
                                   49805              *

 0093E0 1222/47D0 B030_                                              ((@R3,EQ,' '),OR,(@R3,EQ,','),OR,(@R3,EQ,'='))),BEGIN

0                                  61090              
                                   61091                                                                                   
                                   61092                 FMTPACK -- Routine to generate formatted listing of packet        
                                   61093                                                                                   
                                   61094                   On entry:                                                       
                                   61095                     R0  - packet length                                           
                                   61096                     R1  - packet address                                          
                                   61097                     R15 - SEGCB to use for output lines                           
                                   61098                                                                                   
                                   61099                   If R0 is negative on entry, just format packet headers          
                                   61100                   and first 32 bytes of data.                                     
                                   61101                                                                                   
                                                      
0000000                00000 00015 61102              FMTPWA   RECORD BEGIN
 000000                            61110  1           FMTPWSEG   DS    A                   SEGCB address
 000004                            61111  1           FMTPWORK   DS    CL16                Work area
 000014 00                         61112  1           FMTPWFLG   FLAG  ,                   Flags
 FMTPWFLG.FMTFTRUN 80 ONES         61116  1                      FLAG  FMTFTRUN             - truncate data display
                                   61121  1
 000015                00015 00015 61122                       END
                                   61131

 USING  *,R11
 USING  FMTPWA-(4+52),R9

 00B0F2 9680 904C      00014       61206  1                      SET   FMTFTRUN            Flag truncated data display
 00B0F6                            61212                       END

 000059                            68905  1                      DS    C                   '|'

 USING  *,R11
 00CB98 1831                       69453                       LR    R3,R1               Copy IP address
 00CB9A 187F                       69454                       LR    R7,R15              Save work area address
 00CB9C 181F                       69455                       LR    R1,R15              Output area pointer

1AMELIA   CHECKSUM - compute checksum                                                                                       Page  267
0Current Usings:  (COMMAND+4096,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
0                                  69577              
                                   69578                                                                                   
                                   69579                      CHECKSUM - compute checksum for area of memory               
                                   69580                                                                                   
                                   69581                      On entry:  R0  = length of area                              
                                   69582                                 R1  = address of area                             
                                   69583                                 R15 = base value for new checksum                 
                                   69584                                                                                   
                                   69585                                 (If R0 is negative on entry, this is a            
                                   69586                                 partial checksum (FINAL=NO in the call),          
                                   69587                                 and the final complementing is not done.          
                                   69588                                                                                   
                                   69589                      On exit:   R15 = checksum                                    
                                   69590                                                                                   
                                                      
000CC3C 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 69591              CHECKSUM PROC
 USING  *,R11
 00CC60 1870                       69633                       LR    R7,R0               Save initial length parm
 00CC62 1000                       69634                       LPR   R0,R0               Insure positive length
                                   69635                       
                                   69636                         Main loop - use 32-bit addition  
                                   69637                       
 00CC64 4120 0004            00004 69638                       LA    R2,4                Constant of 4
 00CC68 1902/4750 B022             69639                       WHILE (R0,GE,R2),BEGIN    While 4 or more bytes left,
 00CC6E 5EF0 1000            00000 69656  1                      AL    R15,@R1             Add next 4 bytes to sum
 00CC72 47C0 B01A/5EF0_      0CC7A 69657  1                      IF    CARRY,'INCR R15'    Check for carry
 00CC7A 1A12                       69676  1                      AR    R1,R2               Incr pointer by 4
 00CC7C 1B02                       69677  1                      SR    R0,R2               Decr remaining length by 4
 00CC7E 47F0 B008            0CC68 69678                       END
                                   69683                       
                                   69684                         Process residual bytes.  
                                   69685                       
 00CC82 1B22                       69686                       CLEAR R2
 00CC84 5900 BCB4/4770_      0D914 69690                       IF    (R0,EQ,3),'ICM R2,8+4+2,@R1'
 00CC90 B034/47F0 B040_0CC90 0CC8A 69713                       ELSEIF (R0,EQ,2),'ICM R2,8+4,@R1'
 00CCA0 B044/47F0 B050_0CCA0 0CC9A 69745                       ELSEIF (R0,EQ,1),'ICM R2,8,@R1'
 00CCB0 1EF2                       69777                       ALR   R15,R2
 00CCB2 47C0 B05A/5EF0_      0CCBA 69778                       IF    CARRY,'INCR R15'
                                   69797                       
                                   69798                         Compute final 16-bit sum.  
                                   69799                       
 00CCBA 18EF                       69800                       LR    R14,R15             Copy sum
 00CCBC 88E0 0010            00010 69801                       SRL   R14,16              Get high order 16 bit sum
 00CCC0 54F0 BCBC            0D91C 69802                       N     R15,=A(X'FFFF')     Isolate low order 16 bit sum
 00CCC4 1EFE                       69803                       ALR   R15,R14             Add high and low order sums
 00CCC6 59F0 BCBC/47D0_      0D91C 69804                       IF    (R15,GT,=A(X'FFFF')),BEGIN  If carry out of 16 bits,
 00CCCE 54F0 BCBC            0D91C 69820  1                      N     R15,=A(X'FFFF')             Clear carry
 00CCD2 5EF0 BCB0            0D910 69821  1                      INCR  R15                         Adjust sum
 00CCD6                            69824                       END
                                   69828
                                   69829            C          IF    ((R7,P),AND,         If final checksum,
 00CCD6 1277/47D0 B088_                                              (R15,NE,=A(X'FFFF'))),BEGIN  and result not 'FFFF'
 00CCE4 57F0 BCBC            0D91C 69858  1                      X     R15,=A(X'FFFF')     Get 1's complement
1AMELIA   CHECKSUM - compute checksum                                                                                       Page  268
0Current Usings:  (COMMAND+4096,R8) (*,R11) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
000CCE8                            69859                       END
 00CCE8 18D9/980C D004_            69863                       PEND
 DROP   *,R11
1AMELIA   CHKUDP - Compute UDP packet checksum                                                                              Page  269
0Current Usings:  (COMMAND+4096,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________
0                                  69884              
                                   69885                                                                                   
                                   69886                 CHKUDP -- Compute UDP packet checksum                             
                                   69887                                                                                   
                                   69888                   On entry:                                                       
                                   69889                     R0,R1 - UDP packet address and length                         
                                   69890                     R15   - IP header address                                     
                                   69891                                                                                   
                                                      
000CCF6 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 69892              CHKUDP   PROC
 USING  *,R11
 00CD1A 1860                       69934                       LR    R6,R0               Save packet length
 00CD1C 1871                       69935                       LR    R7,R1               Save packet address
 USING  UDPHDR,R7                  69936                       WITH  (UDPHDR,R7)         ## UDPHDR
 USING  IPHDR,R15                  69949                       WITH  (IPHDR,R15)         ## IPHDR
 00CD1E D701 7006 7006 00006 00006 69962                       CLEAR UDPCHK              Clear checksum
 00CD24 181D/41D0 D00C             69969                       XPUSH ,,12,PTR=R1         Space for pseudo-header
 00CD2A D203 1000 C034 00000 00034 69972                       MVC   @R1(4),NITIP        Our IP address
 00CD30 D203 1004 F010 00004 00010 69973                       MVC   @R1+4(4),IPDST      IP dest address
 00CD36 D201 1008 BCD6 00008 0D9F0 69974                       MVC   @R1+8(2),=Y(IPUDP#)  Protocol type
 00CD3C 4060 100A            0000A 69975                       STH   R6,@R1+10           Packet length
 00CD40 4100 000C/1100_      0000C 69976                       CHECKSUM (R1),12,FINAL=NO Checksum pseudo-header
 00CD4E 1817/1806/58E0_            69998                       CHECKSUM (R7),(R6),(R15)  Checksum packet data
 00CD58 40F0 7006            00006 70018                       STH   R15,UDPCHK          Set checksum in UDP header
 00CD5C 18D9/980C D004_            70019                       PEND
 DROP   IPHDR,R15
 DROP   UDPHDR,R7
 DROP   *,R11

0                                  71709              
                                   71710                                                                                   
                                   71711                 GETPORT -- Routine to get an available UDP port number for        
                                   71712                   the caller.                                                     
                                   71713                                                                                   
                                   71714                   On entry:                                                       
                                   71715                     R1 - UPATH ptr                                                
                                   71716                                                                                   
                                   71717                   On exit:                                                        
                                   71718                     R15 - port number to use (or zero if none left)               
                                   71719                                                                                   
                                                      
000D1AC 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 71720              GETPORT  PROC
 USING  *,R11
 00D1D0 1851                       71762                       LR    R5,R1
 USING  UPATH,R5                   71763                       WITH  (UPATH,R5)
 00D1D2 D503 B75C 5000_0D92C 00000 71776                       IF    (UPATH,NE,'PATH'),'FAIL "Bad UPATH address"'
                                   71802                 
                                   71803                   Take the next available port number and link it to the   
                                   71804                     path so the port number can be released when the path  
                                   71805                     is closed.                                             
                                   71806                 
 00D1E6 5830 C148/1233       00148 71807                       LT    R3,NITPNQH          Next available PNUM
 00D1EC 4780 B05C            0D22C 71811                       IF    NZ,BEGIN            We've got one...
 USING  PNUM,R3                    71822  1                      WITH  (PNUM,R3)
 00D1F0 58F0 3000            00000 71835  1                      L     R15,PNUMLINK        Next free entry
 00D1F4 50F0 C148            00148 71836  1                      ST    R15,NITPNQH         Make it the new queue head
 00D1F8 12FF/4770 B034_            71837  1                      IF    (R15,Z),'CLEAR NITPNQT'  No entries remain
 00D204 D703 3000 3000 00000 00000 71863  1                      CLEAR PNUMLINK            We will be the new queue tail
 00D20A 58F0 501C/12FF       0001C 71870  1                      LT    R15,UPATPNQT        Our owned port queue tail
 00D210 4770 B04C            0D21C 71874  1                      IF    Z,BEGIN             Nothing on our queue...
 00D214 5030 5018            00018 71885  2                        ST    R3,UPATPNQH         Set queue head
 00D218 5030 501C            0001C 71886  2                        ST    R3,UPATPNQT         ...and tail
 00D21C                            71887  1                      END
 00D21C B050/47F0 B058 0D21C 0D212 71891  1                      ELSE  BEGIN               Add to end of queue...
 00D220 5030 F000            00000 71902  2                        WITH  (PNUM,R15),'ST R3,PNUMLINK'  Link us to end
 USING  PNUM,R15
 DROP   PNUM,R15
 00D224 5030 501C            0001C 71926  2                        ST    R3,UPATPNQT         We are the new queue tail
 00D228                            71927  1                      END
 00D228 58F0 3004            00004 71931  1                      L     R15,PNUMVAL         Get port number
 DROP   PNUM,R3                    71932                       END
                                   71941
 00D22C B060/47F0 B062_0D22C 0D1EE 71942                       ELSE  'CLEAR R15'         No port numbers available
                                   71962
 00D232 18D9/980C D004_            71963                       PEND
 DROP   UPATH,R5
 DROP   *,R11

0Current Usings:  (COMMAND+4096,R8) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11

0                                  72832              
                                   72833                                                                                   
                                   72834                 PATHCLS -- Routine to close a user path.                          
                                   72835                                                                                   
                                   72836                   On entry:                                                       
                                   72837                     R1 - path number                                              
                                   72838                                                                                   
                                   72839                   On exit, R15 (and cc):                                          
                                   72840                     0 = closed                                                    
                                   72841                     4 = not closed; R1,R0 = error msg loc, len                    
                                   72842                                                                                   
                                                      
000D45C 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 72843              PATHCLS  PROC
 USING  *,R11
 00D480 1851                       72885                       LR    R5,R1
 USING  UPATH,R5                   72886                       WITH  (UPATH,R5)
 00D482 D503 B4AC 5000_0D92C 00000 72899                       IF    (UPATH,NE,'PATH'),'FAIL "Bad UPATH address"'
                                   72925                       
                                   72926                         Close path (we don't care if it's not open).  
                                   72927                       
 00D496 41F0 0004/5800_      00004 72928                       SCOM  CLOSE,0,L:UPATMGC   Close path
 00D4A2 D203 5000 B530 00000 0D9B0 72946                       MVC   UPATHID,=C'FPTH'    Zap id
                                   72947                 
                                   72948                   Release any owned port numbers.  Add the port numbers to be      
                                   72949                     freed at the end of the free queue, so they won't get re-used  
                                   72950                     for a while.  This minimizes the possibility of a new user     
                                   72951                     getting straggling packets on a previously active port.        
                                   72952                 
 00D4A8 D603 5018 5018_00018 00018 72953                       IF    (UPATPNQH,NZ),BEGIN  We have owned port numbers...
 00D4B2 5840 C14C/1244       0014C 72969  1                      LT    R4,NITPNQT          Previous end of PNUM queue
 00D4B8 4770 B048            0D4C8 72973  1                      IF    Z,BEGIN             Nothing on free queue...
 00D4BC D203 C148 5018 00148 00018 72984  2                        MVC   NITPNQH,UPATPNQH
 00D4C2 D203 C14C 501C 0014C 0001C 72985  2                        MVC   NITPNQT,UPATPNQT
 00D4C8                            72986  1                      END
                                   72990  1
 00D4C8 B04C/47F0 B058 0D4C8 0D4BA 72991  1                      ELSE  BEGIN               Add our ports to end of freeq...
 00D4CC D203 4000 5018 00000 00018 73002  2                        WITH  (PNUM,R4),'MVC PNUMLINK,UPATPNQH'  Link prev to us
 USING  PNUM,R4
 DROP   PNUM,R4
 00D4D2 D203 C14C 501C 0014C 0001C 73026  2                        MVC   NITPNQT,UPATPNQT    New free queue tail
 00D4D8                            73027  1                      END
                                   73031  1
 00D4D8 D703 5018 5018_00018 00018 73032  1                      CLEAR UPATPNQH,UPATPNQT   (Neatness)
 00D4E4                            73044                       END
                                   73048                       
                                   73049                         Remove UPATH from queue.  
                                   73050                       
 00D4E4 4140 C118            00118 73051                       LA    R4,NITPATQH-(UPATLINK-UPATH)

 DROP   UPATH,R5                   73058  1                      WITH  (UPATH,R4)
 USING  UPATH,R4
 00D4E8 1834                       73079  1                      LR    R3,R4               Previous entry
 00D4EA 5840 4004            00004 73080  1                      L     R4,UPATLINK
1AMELIA   PATHCLS - close user path                                                                                         Page  284
0Current Usings:  (UPATH,R4) (COMMAND+4096,R8) (*,R11) (NIT,R12)
0Loc    Object Code    Addr1 Addr2  Stmt Lv Lineno    Source Statement           (Hibal 5, Asmedit 3.3)  HLASM R4.0  2004/03/15 13.11
+___    ______ ____    _____ _____  ____ __ ______    ______ _________

0                                  79213              
                                   79214                                                                                   
                                   79215                CNVTIP - Convert IP address                                        
                                   79216                                                                                   
                                   79217                      On entry:  R0,R1 = length and pointer to IP address          
                                   79218                                                                                   
                                   79219                      On exit:   CC=Z   Not valid IP address                       
                                   79220                                 CC=NZ  IP address returned in R15                 
                                   79221                                                                                   
                                                      
000EB5C 90EF C020/4DE0_      00020 79222              CNVTIP   PROC
 USING  *,R11
 00EB80 95AD 1000/4770_00000       79264                       IF    (@R1,EQ,'['),BEGIN  Check for [addr]
 00EB88 18F1                       79280  1                      LR    R15,R1
 00EB8A 1AF0                       79281  1                      AR    R15,R0
 00EB8C 06F0                       79282  1                      DECR  R15
 00EB8E 95BD F000/4770_00000       79284  1                      IF    (@R15,EQ,']'),BEGIN
 00EB96 5E10 B0DC            0EC5C 79300  2                        INCR  R1
 00EB9A 0600                       79303  2                        DECR  R0
 00EB9C 0600                       79305  2                        DECR  R0
 00EB9E                            79307  1                      END
 00EB9E                            79311                       END
                                   79315
 00EB9E 1821                       79316                       LR    R2,R1               Copy parm address
 00EBA0 1830                       79317                       LR    R3,R0               Copy parm length
 00EBA2 1A31                       79318                       AR    R3,R1               Get parm end address
 00EBA4 1B44                       79319                       CLEAR R4                  Clear loop counter
 00EBA6 1B55                       79323                       CLEAR R5                  Init result register
 00EBA8 1923/47B0 B07E             79327                       WHILE (R2,LT,R3),BEGIN
 00EBAE 1812                       79344  1                      LR    R1,R2               Copy parm pointer
 00EBB0 1923/47B0 B046_            79345  1                      WHILE ((R2,LT,R3),AND,(@R2,NE,'.')),'INCR R2' Find delimiter
 00EBC6 1802                       79386  1                      LR    R0,R2               Compute
 00EBC8 1B01                       79387  1                      SR    R0,R1                 subparm length
 00EBCA 4770 B054/1BFF_      0EBD4 79388  1                      IF    Z,'CLEAR R15; EXIT CNVTIP'
 00EBD4 58E0 B0F4/0DEE       0EC74 79411  1                      DTB   (R1),(R0)           Convert
 00EBDA 4740 B066/59F0_      0EBE6 79426  1                      IF    (M,OR,(R15,GT,255)),'CLEAR R15; EXIT CNVTIP'
 00EBEC 8950 0008            00008 79465  1                      SLL   R5,8                Shift address over
 00EBF0 165F                       79466  1                      OR    R5,R15              Move next byte into result
 00EBF2 5E20 B0DC            0EC5C 79467  1                      INCR  R2                  Step pointer past delimiter
 00EBF6 5E40 B0DC            0EC5C 79470  1                      INCR  R4                  Incr loop counter

0                                  79579              
                                   79580                                                                                   
                                   79581                 GETBUF -- Routine to get temp buffer                              
                                   79582                                                                                   
                                   79583                   Returns pointer to GETBUFSZ-16 byte buffer                      
                                   79584                                                                                   
                                   79585                   On entry:                                                       
                                   79586                     R0 - no. of bytes needed                                      
                                   79587                                                                                   
                                   79588                   On exit:                                                        
                                   79589                     R1 - addr of memory                                           
                                   79590                     R0 - unchanged                                                
                                   79591

0                                  81100              
                                   81101                                                                                   
                                   81102                HEXCONV/HEXSTR -- Routine to convert hex digits to binary.         
                                   81103                                                                                   
                                   81104                  On entry:                                                        
                                   81105                    R1,R0 - string loc,len                                         
                                   81106                    R15   - output string loc (only for "HEXSTR" entry)            
                                   81107                                                                                   
                                   81108                  On exit, CC:                                                     
                                   81109                    neg   - bad hex string (R1,R0 - as on entry)                   
                                   81110                    z,pos - hex string converted. CC set by string len.

0                                  82684              
                                   82685                                                                                   
                                   82686                 FMTDAY -- Routine to format the day of the week from TOD clock    
                                   82687                                                                                   
                                   82688                   On entry:                                                       
                                   82689                     R0-R1 - 64 bit clock (zero=current date)                      
                                   82690                                                                                   
                                   82691                   On exit:                                                        
                                   82692                     R15 - day number (1=Sunday, 2=Monday, etc.)                   
                                   82693                     R1,R0 - day text loc, len ("SUNDAY", "MONDAY", etc.)          
                                   82694

0                                  82970              
                                   82971                                                                                   
                                   82972                 TIMEDATE -- Routine to calculate time/date from TOD clock.        
                                   82973                   (Note format returned is the same as the "TIME BIN" svc.)       
                                   82974                                                                                   
                                   82975                   On entry:

                                   82981

0                                  83561              
                                   83562                                                                                   
                                   83563                 UNPRESS -- Unpresses a line in WYLBUR edit format.                
                                   83564                                                                                   
                                   83565                   On entry:                                                       
                                   83566                     R15- pressed line ptr (before lineno)                         
                                   83567                     R1 - unpress area (at least &LINESZ bytes)                    
                                   83568                                                                                   
                                   83569                   On exit:                                                        
                                   83570                     R1,R0 - unpress loc, len                                      
                                   83571                     R15   - WYLBUR line-number                                    
                                   83572                                                                                   
                                                      
0000000                00000 00004 83573              UNPRWA   RECORD BEGIN
 000000                            83581  1           UNPRLNO    DS    F                   Lineno
 000004                00004 00004 83582                       END
000FA90 50E0 D000/901C_      00000 83592              UNPRESS  PROC  (R1,LSR),UNPRWA,TRACE=NO
 USING  *,R11
 USING  UNPRWA-(4+48),R9
 00FAA0 D203 9034 F000 00000 00000 83639                       MVC   UNPRLNO,@R15        Make aligned line-no available
 00FAA6 9240 1000      00000       83640                       MVI   @R1,C' '            Blank return area
 00FAAA D2E9 1001 1000 00001 00000 83641                       MVC   @R1+1(235-1),@R1
 00FAB0 4110 1000            00000 83642                       LA    R1,@R1              Make sure 1st byte clear
 00FAB4 1301                       83643                       LCR   R0,R1               Set r0 for length calc at end
 00FAB6 1F55/4350 F004             83644                       LC    R5,@R15+4           Get total line length
 00FABC 1255                       83651                       LTR   R5,R5               Is it a null line
 00FABE 4780 B052            0FAF2 83652                       BZ    FINUNP              Br yes
 00FAC2 4160 000F            0000F 83653                       LA    R6,X'0F'            Put mask in r2
 00FAC6 4120 0001            00001 83654                       LA    R2,1                Set r2 for bxle step
 00FACA 0650                       83655                       DECR  R5                  Set r5 so that end of line
 00FACC 4135 F000            00000 83657                       LA    R3,@R15(R5)         Point r3 to end for bxle
 00FAD0 4350 F005            00005 83658              MORECH   IC    R5,@R15+5           Get blank-char control byte
 00FAD4 1845                       83659                       LR    R4,R5               Put in r4 also
 00FAD6 8850 0004            00004 83660                       SRL   R5,4                Shift to get blank count
 00FADA 1A15                       83661                       AR    R1,R5               Move output ptr over blanks
 00FADC 1446                       83662                       NR    R4,R6               Mask to get non-blank count
 00FADE 4780 B04E            0FAEE 83663                       BZ    ALLBLS              No move if zero count
 00FAE2 1854                       83664                       LR    R5,R4               Put count in r5
 00FAE4 0650/4450 B674_            83665                       DEX   R5,'MVC @R1(0),@R15+6' Move text to output
 00FAEA 1AF4                       83684                       AR    R15,R4              Bump input ptr past text
 00FAEC 1A14                       83685                       AR    R1,R4               Bump output ptr past text
 00FAEE 87F2 B030            0FAD0 83686              ALLBLS   BXLE  R15,R2,MORECH       Add 1 (in r2) to input ptr
                                   83687              *                       (in r15) and branch if <= end (in r3)
                                   83688              * note that this now falls through even for an invalid pressed
                                   83689              *      line.  for a valid line (r3+1) must equal r15 but there
                                   83690              *      is no reason to check because there is no good recovery
                                   83691              *      if the line happens to be invalid.
 00FAF2 58F0 9034            00000 83692              FINUNP   L     R15,UNPRLNO         Line-no to R15
 00FAF6 1A01                       83693                       AR    R0,R1               Calc total length of line
 00FAF8 18D9/981C D004_            83694                       PEND

 DROP   *,R11

0                                  83720              
                                   83721                                                                                   
                                   83722                 DEQUOTE/DEQSTR -- Routine to dequote string.                      
                                   83723                                                                                   
                                   83724                  On entry:                                                        
                                   83725                    R1,R0 - string loc,len                                         
                                   83726                    R15   - output string loc (only for "DEQSTR" entry)            
                                   83727                                                                                   
                                   83728                  On exit, CC:                                                     
                                   83729                    NEG   - not a string (r1,r0 - same as on entry)                
                                   83730                    Z,POS - string dequoted (r1,r0 -loc,len of dequoted string)    
                                   83731                                                                                   
                                                      
0                                  83732                       ENTRY DEQUOTE
 00FB06 41F0 1001            00001 83733              DEQUOTE  LA    R15,@R1+1           De-quote string in place
                                   83734

 USING  *,R11
 00FB1A 5900 B5BE/4740_      100D8 83774                       IF    (R0,LT,2),DQBAD     Bad string
 00FB22 957D 1000/4780_00000       83794                       IF    ((@R1,NE,''''),AND,(@R1,NE,'"')),DQBAD
                                   83828
 00FB32 0600                       83829                       DECR  R0                  Strip off outer quotes
 00FB34 0600                       83831                       DECR  R0
 00FB36 1841                       83833                       LR    R4,R1               Remember kind of quote
 00FB38 4160 1001            00001 83834                       LA    R6,@R1+1            Inp ptr
 00FB3C 181F                       83835                       LR    R1,R15
 00FB3E 1850                       83836                       LR    R5,R0
 00FB40 1255/47D0 B052             83837                       WHILE (R5,POS),BEGIN
 00FB46 D200 F000 6000 00000 00000 83853  1                      MVC   @R15(1),@R6
 00FB4C D500 F000 4000_00000 00000 83854  1                      IF    ('CLC @R15(1),@R4',EQ),'LA R6,@R6+1; DECR R5; DECR R0'
 00FB5E 41F0 F001            00001 83877  1                      LA    R15,@R15+1

 00FB66 0650                       83879  1                      DECR  R5
 00FB68 47F0 B026            0FB40 83881                       END

 00FB6E 47F0 B05A            0FB74 83887                       EXIT
                                   83890
 00FB72 114B                       83891              DQBAD    LNR   R4,BR               Set cc=neg
 00FB74 18D9/982C D004_            83892                       PEND  *
